Help Save the Tree Trout

Save the Rocky Mountain Tree Trout

Elusive. Arboreal. Surprisingly good at climbing. The Rocky Mountain Tree Trout depends on our forests for habitat—and our very loud, slightly dramatic voices—for protection.

Quick links to the good stuff—dive deeper on each page.

Origin, traits, ecology, and evolution of the tree trout.

Practical reference for spotting tree trout (respectfully).

Scientific literature, studies, and the ongoing controversy.

For Educators

Teaching scientific thinking without teaching certainty.

Kids Guide

Forest walk guide for young explorers and their tall friends.

FAQs

Short answers to the most common (and uncommon) questions.

Get Involved
